channel.title: Snark Animations and Cool Easter Egg
channel.description: Just something I found while playing some Black Mesa. This made snarks even cuter for me, and I literally started laughing when I saw the 2nd idle animation (IT'S SO GOOD.) As for the sound effects for the idle animations, I made them myself (the snark squeaking) because unfortunately both idle animations don't have sound effects in-game... [youtube.com/watch?v=t4qywJaEv5s](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4qywJaEv5s) Probably the most pointless video I've ever uploaded but I felt like this was worth sharing. IT'S JUST TOO GOOD.

item.title: Snark Animations and Cool Easter Egg
item.dc:creator: AsinoEsel
item.description:
Just something I found while playing some Black Mesa. This made snarks even cuter for me, and I literally started laughing when I saw the 2nd idle animation (IT’S SO GOOD.)
As for the sound effects for the idle animations, I made them myself (the snark squeaking) because unfortunately both idle animations don’t have sound effects in-game…

Probably the most pointless video I’ve ever uploaded but I felt like this was worth sharing. IT’S JUST TOO GOOD.
